name: Scheduler Agent
description: Central scheduling coordinator A2A server that ingests TouristRequest and GuideOffer messages, matches tourists to guides via a greedy algorithm, and emits ScheduleProposal artifacts plus acknowledgments.

skills.name: Tourist Guide Matching
skills.description: Matches tourists with tour guides based on availability, budget, and preferences.
examples: Produces ScheduleProposal artifacts containing matched Assignment entries

skills.name: Guide Offer Collection
skills.description: Receives guide offers and stores them for future tourist request matching.
examples: Acknowledges GuideOffer with an Acknowledgment artifact
